content.question: Evaluate the extent to which trans-Atlantic exchanges affected colonial culture in British North America in the period from 1700 to 1770.

frqParts.text: Evaluate the extent to which trans-Atlantic exchanges affected colonial culture in British North America in the period from 1700 to 1770.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
